languages.text: {n}Хальбрандт поднимает взор от тел павших собратьев. В его голосе клокочет ярость:{/n} "Я — гнев Всеотца, и гневу его должно ужасать. Предатель Семнадцатого, я иду за твоей головой!"

{n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"
languages.original_text: {n}Хальбрандт поднимает взор от тел павших собратьев. В его голосе клокочет ярость:{/n} "Я — гнев Всеотца, и гневу его должно ужасать. Предатель Семнадцатого, я иду за твоей головой!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice, distorted by his helmet's vox-speaker:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and His wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice, distorted by his helmet's vox-speaker:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"

{n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"

languages.text: {n}哈尔布兰特抬起头，看着战死兄弟们的尸体。你听到他的声音中迸发着沸腾的怒火。{/n}“我是全父之怒，他的怒火令万物畏怖。我要把你的脑袋摘下来，第十七军团的叛徒！”
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"

traits.locale_text: {n}哈尔布兰特抬起头，看着战死兄弟们的尸体。你听到他的声音中迸发着沸腾的怒火。{/n}“我是全父之怒，他的怒火令万物畏怖。我要把你的脑袋摘下来，第十七军团的叛徒！”
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}ハルブラントは倒れた同胞たちの遺体から顔を上げる。怒りではらわたが煮えくり返っているのが、彼のヘルメットのヴォクス・スピーカーが放つ歪んだ声から、あなたにも伝わる。{/n}「俺は全知の父の憤怒、そして彼の怒りはすなわち恐怖。第17部隊の裏切り者め、俺は貴様の首をとるぞ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice, distorted by his helmet's vox-speaker:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハルブラントは倒れた同胞たちの遺体から顔を上げる。怒りではらわたが煮えくり返っているのが、彼のヘルメットのヴォクス・スピーカーが放つ歪んだ声から、あなたにも伝わる。{/n}「俺は全知の父の憤怒、そして彼の怒りはすなわち恐怖。第17部隊の裏切り者め、俺は貴様の首をとるぞ！」
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}Halbrandt dirige la mirada a los cadáveres de sus hermanos caídos. Se puede escuchar la rabia crepitante en su voz:{/n} «Soy la ira del Padre de todas las cosas. Y su ira ha de ser temida. ¡Traidor de la XVII, tu cabeza será mía!».
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt dirige la mirada a los cadáveres de sus hermanos caídos. Se puede escuchar la rabia crepitante en su voz:{/n} «Soy la ira del Padre de todas las cosas. Y su ira ha de ser temida. ¡Traidor de la XVII, tu cabeza será mía!».
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}Halbrandt détourne le regard des dépouilles de ses frères, sa voix déformée par une rage bouillonnante :{/n} « Je suis le courroux du Père de Tous. Craignez Sa fureur ! Traître de la XVIIe, tes jours sont comptés ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt détourne le regard des dépouilles de ses frères, sa voix déformée par une rage bouillonnante :{/n} « Je suis le courroux du Père de Tous. Craignez Sa fureur ! Traître de la XVIIe, tes jours sont comptés ! »
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}Halbrandt blickt von den Leichen seiner gefallenen Brüder auf. Du hörst die brodelnde Wut in seiner Stimme:{/n} "Ich bin der Zorn des Allvaters, und Sein Zorn ist furchtbar. Verräter der XVII., ich werde mir Euren Kopf holen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt blickt von den Leichen seiner gefallenen Brüder auf. Du hörst die brodelnde Wut in seiner Stimme:{/n} "Ich bin der Zorn des Allvaters, und Sein Zorn ist furchtbar. Verräter der XVII., ich werde mir Euren Kopf holen!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine

languages.text: {n}Halbrandt, ölü kardeşlerinin bedenlerine bakıyor. Sesinde öfkeyi hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "Ben Yücebaba'nın gazabıyım, onun gazabından korkulur. XVII'nin haini, kelleni alacağım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt looks up from the bodies of his fallen brothers. You can hear the seething rage in his voice:{/n} "I am the wrath of the Allfather, and his wrath is to be dreaded. Traitor of the XVIIth, I will have your head!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt, ölü kardeşlerinin bedenlerine bakıyor. Sesinde öfkeyi hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "Ben Yücebaba'nın gazabıyım, onun gazabından korkulur. XVII'nin haini, kelleni alacağım!"
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine
